snippet: A political activist who has been on a hunger strike for nearly three months and 20 others convicted of protesting the ruling monarchy will remain in prison pending new trials.
abstract: Bahraini court orders retrials for political activist Abdulhadi al-Khawaja, who has been on hunger strike for nearly three months, and 20 others convicted by military tribunal for their participation in protests against the country's ruling monarchy.
lead_paragraph: A political activist who has been on a hunger strike for nearly three months and 20 others convicted of protesting the ruling monarchy will remain in prison pending new trials.

headline.main: Bahraini Court Orders Retrials for Activists
headline.print_headline: Bahraini Court Orders Retrials For Activists
